info.name: Chat
info.description: This collection consists of endpoints relating to the chat feature of the universal school system.

item.name: School
Add A New Message To School Chat

request.description:
This endpoint is where new messages should be submitted to for them to be saved in the database. 
This route is meant for saving the chat information of a specific school.

response.name: Add A New Message To School Chat
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Message Saved!",
    "results": 1,
    "data": {
        "_id": "5ee381872e0f06116c10b4a2",
        "text": "I officially welcome you all to a new term. Hope you're all ready for a new round of academic activities? This term holds great promise for all of us.",
        "username": "bukolaayantola18",
        "time": "2020-06-12T13:22:15.314Z",
        "school": "5ecb08dfd2595416f0dc9977",
        "userCategory": "Staff",
        "userRole": "Principal",
        "userId": "5ed2baf8ca1dbc1d6c0095d4",
        "__v": 0
    }
}

item.description: This folder consists of endpoints relating to performing CRUD operations on chats and messages for schools.

item.name: Classroom

request.description: This endpoint can be used by classrrom students and teachers to backup their chats or messages.

response.name: Create A Classroom Chat Message
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Message Saved!",
    "results": 1,
    "data": {

        "userId": "5ed2baf8ca1dbc1d6c0095d5",
        "classId": "5ed503549d420d1d3849a079",

    }
}

request.description: This endpoint can be used to delete a specific chat in a classroom of a school.

item.description: This folder consits of endpoints relating to chat activities for classroom students and teachers.

item.name: Groups

request.description: Use this endpoint to create groups in a school.

Use this endpoint to retrieve multiple groups in a school.

You can also filter the school groups by their names.
You can use this endpoint to see the groups that you belong to in a school.
Use this endpoint to retrieve the details of a specific group in a school.
Use this endpoint to update the name of a group.
Administrators can use this endpoint to add new member to their groups.
Use this endpoint to delete one of your group members.
Members of a group can use this endpoint to remove themselves from the group.

response.name: Remove Me From Group

request.description: A group administrator can use this endpoint to delete their group.

item.description:
Students and teachers should be able to create groups for things like group assignments, group projects and other things of a collaborative nature. These groups can then form the basis of group chats.

Essentially, before a group chat can happen, the group must first exist.
